cms.query.QueryText: SELECT RoleID FROM Board_Role WHERE (RoleID IN (SELECT RoleID FROM View_CMS_UserRoleMembershipRole WHERE UserID = @ID AND (ValidTo IS NULL OR ValidTo >@ValidTo)) OR (RoleID IN (SELECT RoleID FROM CMS_Role WHERE RoleName IN ( ##GENERICROLES##) AND CMS_Role.SiteID IN (SELECT BoardSiteID FROM Board_Board WHERE BoardID = Board_Role.BoardID)))) AND ##WHERE##
